title: PA-17-05: Posting of Waivers Issued under Executive Order 13770
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/01C5C5C3B64AB3C6852585BA005BEC3D/$FILE/PA-17-05 Posting of Waivers Issued under Executive Order 13770.pdf?open
summary: This program advisory notifies agencies of the requirement to provide OGE with copies of waivers issued under Executive Order 13770 as they are issued.
